function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of questionnaires, photographs, and testimonies increases the risk of personal data exposure and privacy breaches.","Impact":"Exposure of intimate experiences and personal information can lead to privacy violations and psychological distress.","Mitigation":"Obtain informed consent, anonymize data, and store it securely in compliance with data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, secure data storage solutions, and encryption techniques.","People":"Participants, especially those sharing intimate experiences and personal information.","Owner":"Research team, data protection officer, and IT department."},{"Description":"Accessing homes for research purposes poses a risk of spreading contagious diseases, especially if proper precautions are not taken.","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases and health risks to both researchers and participants.","Mitigation":"Adopt strict hygiene protocols, use personal protective equipment, and seek consent for in-person visits.","Technologies":"Contactless data collection methods, remote surveys, and virtual home tours.","People":"Researchers, participants, and anyone in the household.","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities, and participants."}]}
